content: We hear that PVD Vegan Restaurant Week begins on Friday! If you're looking for some of the tastiest places to find plant-based food year round in downtown Providence, though, we've got ya. https://t.co/T5Wmi88Ixx

@starbetter The 1st place that comes to mind is Xaco Taco, which is next to The District. Both are in the jewelry district downtown & have outdoor seating 

If your speed, Plant City is an excellent plant-based food eatery downtown with a cool outdoor dining area. Iâ€™ll try to think of others
